availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Whittington King (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, merchant and insurance agent)

body.p: Fayette County, Kentucky, merchant and insurance agent. Maryland native. Married to Elizabeth King. Father of Lizzie King, Henry W. King, and Helen W. King. Merchant in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed Alfred Allen and Isaac W. Gilbow as clerks in Fayette County in 1850. Insurance agent in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington District 2, p. 207A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 518.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington District 4, p. 334B.
